text: Back Street is a 1932 American drama movie directed by John M. Stahl and is based on the novel of the same name by Fannie Hurst and was remade in 1941 and 1961. It stars Irene Dunne, John Boles, George Meeker, James Donlan, Doris Lloyd and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John M. Stahl
title: Back Street
